summary:
I am Mohammad Rahmani & I have 12 years’ experience in Planning, Project Control, Cost Estimation & Cost Control, Project Progress Measurement systems designer in the Dams, infrastructures, Buildings, Industrial, Tower Construction and high rise buildings, Water treatment, bridge & Railway and have worked on several top rated multinational companies on innovated projects in Georgia, Water Supply,  Turkey – Gold mining, Iran – 1312 units building, Iraq – 512 duplex building, Tajikistan – Tallest dam of the world, Afghanistan – China – Tajikistan border - Silk road.

I have got Professional training on Planning and Project control by new 5D and 6D methods (BIM – Building information Modeling, Revit, NavisWorks, AutoCAD, Primavera), Project modeling, Calculating of Project budget and resource, Project Management Professional. Six Sigma Methods. Risk management and …

I have also multi – Language skill, with fluency in four different languages: English, Turkish, Arabic, Persian.
Recently I’ve worked at international Company – SMK Group - with Ranking 187 in ENR as Project Manager Deputy (The project has been finished.) and also I’m a Building Information Modeling, Primavera, AutoCAD, Revit, Excel tutor in Ankara, Mimtek Institute. www.mimtek.com

treasury_media.title: Ultimate Microsoft Project + Soft Skills (2022)
treasury_media.description:
New Course, New YOU!
our new Ultimate Microsoft Project Course is Published. NOT ONLY you can learn MSP from the very beginning to the very master level, schedule a plan, analyze and update finally get jaw-dropping reports, BUT ALSO you can handle the hectic situations at work with soft skills which you learn as a bonus in this course.

projects.title: Çopler Gold Mine Sulfide Expansion Project
projects.description:
Developing Work Schedule Level 4. Budget Preparation, Work Progress Measurement Design. Invoice
Preparing.
Subcontractors Invoice Preparing. Cash flow and Updating. Plan Deviation Reports. Presenting Actual Work by 3d Method (Navis Works). Design and Following Daily & Weekly Report. Tracking, Updating Schedule and Reporting (Primavera P6). Gathered information‐ by observing, receiving, and otherwise obtaining information from all relevant sources. Estimated quantities and cost of materials, equipment, or labor to determine project feasibility. Earned Value Management Reports. Recommended ways to improve the efficiency of project operations. Coordinated construction activities with all relevant parties. Prepared Analysis reports to track the progress of each phase of Construction. Developed Budget control methods to curb project costs while ensuring safety.

profile_positions.description:
I have a broad range of tasks;

•I’ve developed the Level 4 Resource and cost loaded work schedule by Primavera P6. (A Plan over 5,000 Lines).
•I’ve developed Progress, CPI and SPI measurement (EVM) Reports to control the Construction Progress,
•I’ve made a Comprehensive report by Excel Power Pivot to examine what’s the planned activities for week, what have been finished & how many units are remain which it decreases 30 % of time to find out delayed activity easily.
•I recognized most Important Risks in the project that would affect in the project critical Path. (for an instance, foreseen of connecting infrastructure to the City network to get Occupancy permits)
•I’ve developed Man-hour/Cost Center/Subcontractors Full dashboard reports.
- As Commercial Manager: (it was a promotion)
•Preparing Monthly IPCs’ for Direct and consultant contractors in accordance to their contracts (Fidic, BOQ list & Change Orders, Material on site), 
•I am responsible for Preparing change orders in line with project budget, Contract and accrued works.
•	I’ve designed and I’m responsible to update Comprehensive table of Contractors Committed, Accrued, Certified, Paid & Anticipating the Final Accounts, for management into one-page dashboards report by Power Pivot that saved Reporting & Analyzing time up to 45%.
•	I am in control of Updating, Controlling and Analyzing budget with more than 36,000 lines to take out complex report by power pivots, controlling committed amounts and remain works. 
•	I designed a Process to Achieve an acceleration on processing change orders by 60% & decreasing the wrong or double change orders by approximately 10% of their costs. 
•	I developed Precise Reporting, preparing several simple & complex reports and management dashboards by using excel Power Query and Power Pivot. 
•	I’ve prepared Monthly Executive and Monthly Development report of Whole Site (22 Area) for stakeholders, apartments and facilities divided by Cost and physical performance.

Client: Georgian Infrastructure and Road department.
Engineering: Eptisa.
Project : Water Supply of Kutaisi.

Revising Work Schedule for All Remain works (Road, Bridge, Reservoirs, Buildings, ...)
Preparing and updating Budget.
Designing the Work Progress Measurement system to controlling the project easily.
Creating a Model from project to eliminate conflicts and reworks BY BIM System.
Controlling Subcontractor works.
Measuring Subcontractors works for IPC's.
Preparing Claims document.
Preparing necessary Method Statements. 

Contract Management. (Fidic Book)
Revising and controlling subcontractor work schedule.
Cost analysis in case of need.

Designing the Planned and Real Actual project cost table.
Motivating other Colleague by teaching them.

Also I should mention I've promoted to Project Manager Deputy.
profile_positions.title: Planning & Project Control Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Client: Anagold – Amec Foster Wheeler-GAAP                                
•	Project: Gold Mining Sulfide Expansion Project
•	Location: Turkey, Erzincan. 
•	Position: Planning & Project Control Manager.
 
As a Planning manager I had a broad range of tasks. My main responsibilities;
- Planning & Project Control: I developed Level 4 Resource and cost loaded plan by Primavera P6. (it was the Best Plan between over 30 subcontractors – 5000 Lines). I prepared daily project measurement system to follow work progress every day for Uran & Subcontractor invoices. I designed formats for Monthly, Weekly, Daily Reports and invoices. I designed project animation by NavisWorks (6D Method).
I took care of the planned work packages and the survey of actual works to ensure our project are executed according to the expectation of our clients. I prepared method statements for execution works.
- Cost Control: I designed cost control method to optimize actual work’s cost and planned cost (EVM). And also I was a contract responsible for subcontractor’s Monthly invoices preparation, controlling & Payment. 
- Reports: I prepared deviation reports to compare planned start and actual start and deviation report for delivered packages and not delivered packages to control their affect to project baseline dates.
Developed dashboards to control delays, cost foreseen, machinery and human resource. Prepared 3 weeks look ahead and daily project progress for client.
- Meetings:  Attend all meetings, which involve discussions of any matters, which could affect the schedule
with the Client & Construction team. I prepared weekly PowerPoint presentation for client and stakeholders. 
- Cooperating and advising: Cooperate with PMO center to achieve maximum work performance.
I designed dynamic Material list to monitor deviation of cost. I prepared capex data to summarize project budget. 

I create project dashboard to control actual & planned works. I recommended solutions to reduce actual work’s cost.
profile_positions.title: Planning & Project Control Manager

profile_positions.description:
I developed Work Schedule by Microsoft Project and Primavera P6, I designed dynamic Material list to monitor deviation of cost. I prepared capex data to summarize project budget. designed Needed daily, Weekly, Monthly report for Client and internal side. Prepared deviation report for planned and actual curves. Designed Earned value management reports. As a cost control, I was responsible for invoices.
I create project dashboard to control actual & planned works. I recommended solutions to reduce actual work’s cost. Handled meetings to ensure that the actual works were on the planed line.

Analyzed delays to ensure we were on schedule or not. Updated project budget. I designed deviation report for machinery, human resource and work performance to control actual work and baseline. 
Cooperate with PMO center to align delayed works with planned percentages and solve work problems.
Professional photographing and video capturing from site for lesson learned.

I designed delays report to control and define corrective or preventing methods to eliminate work stoppage.
Professional picture & video capturing for valuable lesson learned. Designed and cooperated with other units like 3d modeling, website design and Company catalogue design.
Prepared as-built & graphical items to show project status.
Prepared bid documentation, Material takeoff and …
Attended all meetings to foreseen solutions if there were problems.

profile_positions.description:
•	Client: Iraq Ministry of Housing

As a project control head I was responsible for updating and tracking project schedule & budget.
I designed the best monthly report for Stratus holding which published for all projects.
I designed delays report to control and define corrective or preventing methods to eliminate work stoppage.
I designed deviation report like Planned and actual works, earned value reports, Machinery, human resource, material graphs and dashboards.
Attended daily meetings and controlled daily work to ensure we were able to finish project on time.
I designed 3D model of 512 unit buildings to present our work for client.
Professional picture & video capturing for valuable lesson learned and designed project website.
